title: 携带版0.14.0将加入漏斗
author: LeoPro
txt_content:
本帖最后由 LeoPro 于 2016-1-22 14:23 编辑 







hoppers-0.14.0-696x348.png (175.35 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

0.14漏斗
2016-1-22 07:57 上传





Hoppers are being added in Minecraft Pocket Edition! They are an incredible addition to the Redstone updates, as they make automated farming and other processes very possible and lucrative.

漏斗将在Minecraft：携带版加入！它们是惊人的红石更新之中的增加，因为它们使自动化养殖和其它的工序变得有可能而且有利。

What’s a Hopper?
漏斗是什么？


A hopper is a block that catches items, and can automatically transfer them into a storage block (chests, double chests etc).

漏斗是一个能抓住其它方块，并能自动转移到一个存储块的方块（箱子、大箱子等）。

What does it look like?它是什么样子的？




Hopper.png (4.63 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

漏斗
2016-1-22 08:01 上传







Hoppers are a very unique block, typically attached to another block item (chest, double chest etc).


漏斗是一个非常独特的方块，通常附在另一个方块上（箱子、大箱子等）。


How long until they’re added?直到它们加入要多久？

Hoppers will be added in the upcoming 0.14.0 update. We will continue to keep the most up to date information on 0.14.0 on the website, so be sure to check back often for status updates.


漏斗将在即将到来的0.14.0更新添加。我们在网站上将继续保持0.14.0最新的信息，所以一定要经常回来检查更新。

 原文地址(英文)
感谢大家支持！
